name: Little Duck
description:
Duck has a simple life. And this game too. Control the duck to catch fishes, avoid enemies and grow as fast as possible.

In this game, you will be a duck and you have to catch as much fishes as possible to get more bigger. Be care of snakes around!

Features:

- 2 different kinds of cute duck.

- 3 growing states of each kind

- Bosses, mini bosses, fishes, snakes, human,...

- Jump, move or dive

- Change background by hours and special days.
